entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Sunny, 10.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Victoria Harbour 2:00 PM PDT Wednesday 22 March 2023
Condition: Mainly Sunny
Temperature: 10.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.0 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 69 %
Dewpoint: 5.1°C
Wind: SSE 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High 13.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. High 13. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers overnight. Wind west 20 km/h except 40 near Juan de Fuca Strait. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 9. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers changing to 70 percent chance of showers near noon. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning then southwest 40 late in the afternoon except gusting to 70 near Juan de Fuca Strait. High 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Wednesday 22 March 2023
